title: Danjohi ga Bukkowareta Sekai no Hito to Jinsei wo Koukanshimashita - Novel Updates
genre: Comedy   Drama   Harem   Romance   School Life   Shounen   Slice of Life
tags: Handsome Male Lead   Male Protagonist   Parallel Worlds
author: Mogi Suzu   もぎすず   茂木鈴
description:
A young man wasn’t popular at all for the three years of junior high school because of his stern face and huge physique. And after failing his entrance exams at the school he wanted to enroll in, it was decided that he would go to a boys' school.

A Goddess came before him, saying that Her favorite handsome man was too popular and in trouble, so She was looking for a man who wasn’t popular to exchange life with Her favorite. 

'Exchange life with a popular man’s life? There must be something behind it!' 
『”Even if that’s the case, it's better than being unpopular for your lifetime.”』
“Well, even if there's inconvenient, I'll get through it with my spirit and guts!' 

The young man told the Goddess so and exchanged his life with a handsome man’s life... 

'Goddess! This isn’t Japan, isn't it?!” 
『“So rude. This is Japan. Of a parallel world.'』

However, the young man then knew that the Parallel World had some problem, that was, an unbalanced gender ratio.
In a way, the heart of a woman who wasn’t popular couldn’t be understood in the true sense by a normal man there. 

'Am I the only man who understands the feelings of being unpopular?'

This was a story of a man in a harem-like environment, trying his best to make the girls in his surroundings happy.>
